Imports

halgorithm, hdebug_misc, traceif

Types

PrintStyling = object
  fg*: ForegroundColor
  bg*: BackgroundColor
  style*: set[Style]

ColoredString = object
  str*: string
  styling*: PrintStyling

ColoredRune = object
  styling* {...}{.requiresinit.}: PrintStyling
  rune*: Rune

Consts

coloredWhitespaceRune: ColoredRune = (styling: (fg: fgDefault, bg: bgDefault, style: {}),
                                   rune: 32)
